overview:
I’m an experienced financial market analyst who specializes in determining the cause and effect of business decisions to the industry. I have spent at least eight years writing business columns for different print and online publications companies throughout the United States. Likewise, I have written several investigative reports and analysis for different marketing companies.

In several months, I’m expecting to get my Ph.D. in Journalism from a reputable university in New York. Currently, I’m working for various business websites as a marketing consultant. In addition, I serve as business advisor for a nongovernmental organization that focuses in giving start-up businesses funds, and for a Fortune 500 business and marketing firm in New York. When I am neither studying nor working, I devotes my time in fishing, watching sci-fi movies, and taking care of my two sons with my wife Michelle.
